articles.title: Talks Held between DPRK Premier and Cambodian Prime Minister
Agreements Signed between Governments of DPRK and Cambodia
Kim Yong Nam Meets Namibian Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Namibian Delegation 
   Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with the Namibian government delegation headed by Defence Minister Charles D. N. P. Namoloh at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.
